data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Campodonico, Juan F. (2017): A new species of Pentagramma Van Duzee (Hemiptera: Delphacidae: Asiracinae) from Chile, with notes on the host relations of the Idiosystatini Emeljanov. Zootaxa 4291 (3): 588-594, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4291.3.11|16 occurrences
